content.rendered:
Committed to responsible operations

For Kinapse, responsibility can be defined in three areas of corporate, environmental and societal responsibility.

Corporate responsibility

We are committed to acting ethically and with integrity and transparency in all business dealings and to putting effective systems and controls in place to safeguard against any form of modern slavery taking place within the business and our supply chain. As a company, we are committed to eradicating Modern Slavery and you can read our Modern Slavery Statement here.

Our values are embedded at the core of our business; they reflect what is important in the way we work together, and with our partners and clients. They are our guide when making business decisions and deciding priorities. Our Business and Supplier Codes of Conduct help us translate these values into actions that guide us in our daily work for employees and suppliers respectively.

Read the Kinapse Business Code of Conduct here and the Kinapse Supplier Code of Conduct here.

Environmental responsibility

We are committed to contributing towards the protection of the environment by minimising the effects caused by our operations in every location where we operate. Kinapse uses simple and achievable principles and methodologies of environmental management that promote and regulate achievement of good environmental protection through everyone’s contribution. Kinapse is committed to adopting best work practices such that the Carbon footprint remains minimal and waste is managed effectively.

Societal responsibility

We care about the communities we operate and live in, and through our KEEP Giving program, we encourage thought, kindness and consideration for local and global initiatives which aim to improve quality of life across all societies.
